settings.text:
Like menstruation, we chose Saalt because it is emblematic of a basic, essential element for our bodies. Thus, we believe the best approach to period care should be just as simple and elemental.

Join our cause in inspiring people with high-minded alternative to disposables, enabling people with periods to care for themselves using well thought out, natural solutions that are convenient, sustainable, and impactful.

At Saalt, we immerse our team in an exceptional work environment with opportunities to learn and grow. You will be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to ensuring your success by celebrating both big and small things, because we believe our impact is limitless when we work together.

If you are looking to make a worldwide impact, Saalt is the place for you. Saalt HQ is located in beautiful Boise, Idaho.

settings.title: We can't wait to get to know you.

settings.text_content: Browse our open positions if you're interested in combining passion with impact. We have just the place.
